divs: Sighting DetailsI know why the crop circles are appearing. The reason is so that every one on the planet will know that a message is being given. The message need not be understood to understand that it is a message. Delivering a message using crops means that no one person can hide it or use it for personal gain. <><><><> I still say , come on out in to the open in person so that it can be on world wide media. <><> Here is my message to the citizens of the universe, If the issue is who can can do what with who , then come on out in the open so that every one can have a say. Do not give me any tricky logic , As we like to say here on earth , PUT YOUR MONEY WHERE YOUR MOUTH IS ! My self and many others are tired of these stupid games. Every form of life reaches a point and needs to have a direct say so in their own destiny. Now get off your high horse and come on out in the open.
